org.grails.datastore.gorm.finders
[Java] Class FindAllByBooleanFinder

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.datastore.gorm.finders.AbstractFinder
      org.grails.datastore.gorm.finders.DynamicFinder
          org.grails.datastore.gorm.finders.FindAllByFinder
              org.grails.datastore.gorm.finders.FindAllByBooleanFinder

public class FindAllByBooleanFinder
extends FindAllByFinder

The "findAll<booleanProperty>By*" static persistent method. This method allows querying for instances of grails domain classes based on a boolean property and any other arbitrary properties. eg. Account.findAllActiveByHolder("Joe Blogs"); // Where class "Account" has a properties called "active" and "holder" Account.findAllActiveByHolderAndBranch("Joe Blogs", "London"); // Where class "Account" has a properties called "active', "holder" and "branch" In both of those queries, the query will only select Account objects where active=true.

Authors:
Jeff Brown
Graeme Rocher
